item.title: Anthem - TryHackMe
item.description: Anthem is a beginner’s Windows box on TryHackMe. Below is a detailed walkthrough of the steps to follow to attain the root flag on this box. Task 1 The first step, as usual, is to run nmap with nmap -sC -sV -T4 [machine ip] after a few minutes, this will display what ports are open. It appears that HTTP, SMB, and RDP are open. The port for HTTP is the answer for Question 2 (question 1 does not require an answer) and the port for Microsoft Terminal Services is the answer to Question 3.
